name: Artifact
description: Negates X debuffs.

name: Barricade
description: Block is not removed at the start of turn.

name: Buffer
description: Prevent the next X times you would lose HP.

name: Dexterity
description: Increases  Block gained from cards by X.

name: Draw Card
description: Draw X additional cards next turn.

name: Energized
description: Gain X additional Energy next turn.

name: Focus
description: Increases the effectiveness of Orbs by X.

name: Intangible
description: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to 1 this turn. (lasts X turns)

name: Mantra
description: When you gain 10 Mantra, enter Divinity.

name: Metallicize
description: At the end of your/its turn, gain X  Block.

name: Next Turn Block
description: Gain X  Block next turn.

name: Plated Armor
description: At the end of your turn, gain X  Block. Receiving unblocked attack damage reduces Plated Armor by 1.

name: Regenerate
description: At the end of its turn, heals X HP.

name: Ritual
description: At the end of its turn, gains X  Strength.

name: Strength
description: Increases attack damage by X.

name: Thorns
description: When attacked, deals X damage back.

name: Vigor
description: Your next Attack deals X additional damage.

name: Accuracy
description: Shivs deal X additional damage.

name: After Image
description: Whenever you play a card, gain X  Block.

name: Amplify
description: Your next X Power cards are played twice.

name: Battle Hymn
description: At the start of each turn add X Smites into your hand.

name: Berserk
description: At the start of your turn, gain X Energy.

name: Blasphemer
description: At the start of your turn, die. [1]

name: Blur
description: Block is not removed at the start of your next X turns.

name: Brutality
description: At the start of your turn, lose X HP and draw X cards.

name: Burst
description: Your next X Skills are played twice.

name: Collect
description: Put a Miracle+ into your hand at the start of your next X turns.

name: Combust
description: At the end of your turn, lose 1 HP(for each Combust played) and deal X damage to ALL enemies.

name: Corruption
description: Skills cost 0. Whenever you play a Skill, Exhaust it.

name: Creative AI
description: At the start of your turn, add X random Power cards into your hand.

name: Dark Embrace
description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw X cards.

name: Demon Form
description: At the start of your turn, gain X  Strength.

name: Deva
description: At the start of your turn gain Energy N times and increase this gain by X.

name: Devotion
description: At the start of your turn, gain X  Mantra.

name: Double Damage
description: Attacks deal double damage for X turns.

name: Double Tap
description: Your next X Attacks are played twice.

name: Duplication
description: Your next X cards are played twice.

name: Echo Form
description: The first X cards you play each turn are played twice.

name: Electro
description: Lightning hits ALL enemies.

name: Envenom
description: Whenever you deal unblocked attack damage, apply X  Poison.

name: Equilibrium
description: Retain your hand for X turns.

name: Establishment
description: Whenever a card is  Retained, lower its cost by X.

name: Evolve
description: Whenever you draw a Status, draw X cards.

name: Feel No Pain
description: Whenever a card is Exhausted, gain X  Block.

name: Fire Breathing
description: Whenever you draw a Status or Curse card, deal X damage to ALL enemies.

name: Flame Barrier
description: When attacked, deals X damage back. Wears off at the start of your next turn.

name: Foresight
description: At the start of your turn, Scry X.

name: Free Attack Power
description: The next X Attacks you play costs 0.

name: Heatsink
description: Whenever you play a Power card, draw X cards.

name: Hello
description: At the start of your turn, add X random Common cards into your hand.

name: Infinite Blades
description: At the start of your turn, add X Shivs into your hand.

name: Juggernaut
description: Whenever you gain  Block, deal X damage to a random enemy.

name: Like Water
description: At the end of your turn, if you are in Calm, gain X  Block.

name: Loop
description: At the start of your turn, trigger the passive ability of your next Orb X times.

name: Machine Learning
description: At the start of your turn, draw X additional cards.

name: Magnetism
description: At the start of your turn, add X random colorless cards into your hand.

name: Master Reality
description: Whenever a card is created during combat, Upgrade it.

name: Mayhem
description: At the start of your turn, play the top X card of your draw pile.

name: Mental Fortress
description: Whenever you switch Stances, gain X  Block.

name: Nightmare
description: Add X of a chosen card into your hand next turn.

name: Nirvana
description: Whenever you Scry, gain X  Block.

name: Noxious Fumes
description: At the start of your turn, apply X  Poison to ALL enemies.

name: Omega
description: At the end of your turn, deal X damage to ALL enemies.

name: Panache
description: If you play N[5] more cards this turn, deal X damage to all enemies.

name: Pen Nib
description: Your next Attack deals double damage.

name: Phantasmal
description: Deal Double Damage for the next X turns.

name: Rage
description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain X  Block.

name: Rebound
description: The next X cards you play this turn are placed on top of your draw pile.

name: Regeneration
description: At the end of your turn, heal X HP and reduce  Regen by 1.

name: Rushdown
description: Whenever you enter Wrath, draw X cards.

name: Repair
description: At the end of combat, heal X HP.

name: Rupture
description: Whenever you lose HP from a card, gain X  Strength.

name: Sadistic
description: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, deal X damage.

name: Simmering Rage
description: At the start of your next turn, enter Wrath.

name: Static Discharge
description: Whenever you receive unblocked attack damage, channel X  Lightning.

name: Storm
description: Whenever you play a Power card, channel X  Lightning.

name: Study
description: At the end of your turn, shuffle X Insights into your draw pile.

name: Surrounded
description: Receive 50% more damage if attacked from behind. Use targeting cards or potions to change your orientation.

name: The Bomb
description: At the end of N[7] turns, deal X damage to all enemies.

name: Thousand Cuts
description: Whenever you play a card, deal X damage to ALL enemies.

name: Tools of the Trade
description: At the start of your turn, draw X cards and discard X cards.

name: Wave of the Hand
description: Whenever you gain  Block this turn, apply X  Weak to ALL enemies.

name: Well-Laid Plans
description: At the end of your turn,  Retain up to X cards.

name: Confused
description: The costs of your cards are randomized on draw, from 0 to 3.

name: Dexterity (Negative)
description: Decreases  Block gained from cards by X.

name: Dexterity Down
description: At the end of your turn, lose X  Dexterity.

name: Focus (Negative)
description: Decreases the effectiveness of your Orbs by X.

name: Frail
description: Block gained from cards is reduced by 25%.

name: No Draw
description: You may not draw any more cards this turn.

name: Poison
description: At the beginning of its turn, the target loses X HP and 1 stack of  Poison.

name: Shackled
description: At the end of its turn, regains X  Strength.

name: Slow
description: The enemy receives (X*10)% more damage from attacks this turn. Whenever you play a card, increases X by 1.

name: Strength (Negative)
description: Decreases attack damage by X.

name: Strength Down
description: At the end of your turn, lose X  Strength.

name: Vulnerable
description: Target takes 50% more damage from attacks.

name: Weak
description: Target deals 25% less attack damage.

name: Bias
description: At the start of your turn, lose X  Focus.

name: Block Return
description: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain X  Block.

name: Choked
description: Whenever you play a card this turn, the targeted enemy loses X HP.

name: Constricted
description: At the end of your turn, take X damage.

name: Corpse Explosion
description: On death, the enemy deals X times its Max HP worth of damage to all other enemies.

name: Draw Reduction
description: Draw 1 less card next X turns.

name: Entangled
description: You may not play any Attacks this turn.

name: Fasting
description: Gain X less Energy at the start of each turn.

name: Hex
description: Whenever you play a non-Attack card, add X Dazed to your draw pile.

name: Lock-On
description: Lightning and  Dark orbs deal 50% more damage (rounded down) to the targeted enemy.

name: Mark
description: Whenever you play Pressure Points, all enemies with Mark lose X HP.

name: No Block
description: You may not gain  Block from cards for the next X turns.

name: Wraith Form
description: Lose X  Dexterity at the end of your turn.
